message.content:
cs.GT, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.IT. 

The paper deals with the design of rating systems that incentivize efficient social learning among self-interested agents, which is a topic that falls under game theory (cs.GT) and machine learning (cs.LG). The use of disclosure policies and messages to alter agents' incentives towards exploration is also related to artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and data science (cs.DS). Finally, the measurement of success through regret and the analysis of the policies' performance involve information theory (cs.IT).
